entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
